Plot: Charity Event that will benefit a variety of Autism education and family service programs across the country, in support of the overabundance of autistic individuals that so desperately need quality services.
Title: Night of Too Many Stars: An Overbooked Concert for Autism Education
Writer: Russ Armstrong, Andy Blitz, R.J. Fried, Brian Huskey, Anthony Jeselnik (additional material), Anthony King, Dan Mintz, Jason Reich, Craig Rowin, Andrew Secunda, Eric Slovin (head writer), Robert Smigel
Actors: Jason Alexander, Fileena Bahris, Mike Birbiglia, Lewis Black
